@lizhanhui thanks for your excellent review firstly.
1. There are comments on the key methods, and the class name directly describes the role of the current class.
2. Some corner cases have been considered and verified，and for the problem of put half message back failed, in fact, we only send a check request after the put back is successful. and if put back failed, we will continue to process this message, and in order to avoid causing unlimited check，we also added the limit of check times for the message, and in this situation, we will also print an error log for easy monitoring and manual processing. 
3. In fact, the HA mechanism of the transaction message depends on the HA of the rocketMQ itself. In order to avoid the message not being lost, we recommend using the synchronous double-write mechanism and manually upgrading the slave when the master down.
4. I have been changed the identifier to the full-word.
5. I don't think it's an excessive abstraction, I think transaction message is an application of ordinary message, so I need a bridge to avoid directly manipulating the relevant storage of MQ. 
6. Some hard code have  been removed, please review the latest commit.

@duhengforever Why do we not implement transactions checking based on database, and how to confirm previous transaction information if the service is down?

@lizhanhui

@klaus-pd In order to avoid external dependencies, such as database, we used the mechanism of rocketMQ itself to implement the check logic. and if the producer down, broker will send check request to other producers with same produceId.

@AnthonyZero Thank you for the report!

When I try to start `namesrv` by `mqnamesrv.cmd` I can't reproduce the error you mentioned. Would you mind providing more details about your development environment such as java version, maven version, ROCKETMQ_HOME value, etc.

And here are some tips you may help:
- you should set the ROCKETMQ_HOME to the directory where the built package is the default value should be ${ROCKETMQ_PROJECT}/distribution/target/apache-rocketmq
- you may check the ROCKETMQ_HOME value in your cmd shell by `echo %ROCKETMQ_HOME%`
- If you run the script `mqnamesrv.cmd` in the terminal of IDE (e.g. Intellij idea), try to restart the IDE

Wish that can provide some intiutions for you. 
Thank you!

Thans for your report!
As the [doc](http://rocketmq.apache.org/docs/best-practice-consumer/) mentioned:

> 
Consumer Group and Subscriptions
The first thing you should be aware of is that **different Consumer Group** can consume the same topic independently, and **each of them will have their own consuming offsets**. Please make sure each Consumer within the **same Group** to subscribe the same topics.
> 
I just tried it as you described,i did not meet this problem.but when i run another consumer with different consumeGroup,the problem will occur .maybe you could check if you run a new consumer with  diffrent consumeGroup.
If there's a further question,please be free to ask.thanks.

@AnthonyZero yes,you can't put the rocketmq in the path which contains spaces.for currently release version.you have to put rocketmq in a non-spaces path.sorry for the inconvenience.we will improve it as soon as possible.

@AnthonyZero Java doesn't support path which contains spaces. So when you have spaces in your project directory which is included to classpath cause this error.

代码实现是在每次查询时取同一producerGroup下可用producer回查，极端情况producer异常退出channel任然被broker持有导致回查失败，下一次回查会路由到不同producer上。可以观察broker端是否有类似“Check transaction failed because invoke producer exception”的错误日志来确认是否请求到了异常的channel上。
另外最好贴一下你的相关代码实现和配置，最好有日志输出便于大家分析。
bug still exist,  version 4.3.0

运行的代码就是http://rocketmq.apache.org/docs/transaction-example/上提供的，查看后台日志有输出
WARN Transaction-msg-check-thread - Check transaction failed, channel is null. groupId=producerGroup1

大概知道什么原因了，producer在start()后，必须发一条消息，本地MQClientInstance类通过topic获得该topic的路由信息，知道对应哪些broker，broker上才能注册这个producer到相应的producerGroup下，才能收到回查消息。如果只是start(),而不发送一条消息，这个producer是收不到回查消息的。这种处理方式也不知道好不好，如果业务上真有start后，很长时间没有其他消息的情况，是不是就收不到之前消息的回查信息了？
@zangyk producer在broker端的注册并不需要通过发送消息，而是通过发送心跳包的方式。
Please follow the community pr template, It would be helpful to make a clear pr to let the community guys know your idea.
@yuxuanxinchen 请用最新版本验证，如果还有问题，发邮件到rocketmq user列表里，感谢你的支持。

MQClientInstance中是通过topic从nameserver上确定对应哪些的broker的，如果不发消息，MQClientInstance中调用MQProducerInner的getPublishTopicList(),中就没有这个topic的值，获取不到对应的broker，发心跳时也就不会给这些broker发心跳。
也有一种其他处理方法是：producer在start前，设置producer.setCreateTopicKey("topic");这样即使不发消息，MQClientInstance也能知道topic对应的broker，向他们发送心跳，可以在broker注册producer信息，向它发回查消息。
